arts.ttl: Nat Phillips gives West Brom a lift and wrecks Stoke’s perfect start to season
arts.athr: Dominic Booth at the Bet365 Stadium
arts.sum: West Brom bounced back from a rough week with a gnarly victory to puncture the mood at the Championship’s early pacesetters, Stoke. Ryan Mason, the head coach, had seen two key players depart in the days before this trip and had to watch from the stands as he served a touchline suspension. That did not prevent his team torpedoing Stoke’s 100% start to the campaign with a win that was as hard-fought as it was deserved. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: West Brom end Stoke's winning start
arts.sum: West Brom brought an end to Stoke's perfect start to the Championship season after securing a 1-0 win which helped them maintain their unbeaten record and leapfrog their opponents in the table.
Score predictions for every weekend game, kicking off with a Friday cracker between Leicester and Birmingham.

arts.ttl: Stoke vs West Brom - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Stoke City and West Bromwich Albion, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
